message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.NA

Reasoning: The problem addressed in the paper involves geometric optimization, specifically finding a convex polygon of maximum area or perimeter contained in a given simple polygon. This suggests that the paper belongs to the computational geometry (cs.CG) sub-category. Additionally, the paper makes use of probabilistic techniques and analysis, which could also place it in the sub-categories of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), discrete mathematics (cs.DM), game theory (cs.GT), or numerical analysis (cs.NA).
